Public MustInherit Class CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty Implements IMessageProperty

Docs.summary: Provides an abstract base class for deferring correlation key calculation until all of the correlation data is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is typically used to allow other channels to provide correlation data before a message is sent on the wire.

Docs.summary: Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.

Docs.summary: Adds required correlation data to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When required correlation data is added, it is removed from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.NeededData%2A> list. When all required data has been added, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.NeededData%2A> list is empty and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.IsFullyDefined%2A> returns `true`.

Docs.param: The message to be correlated.
The interval in which correlation must be finalized or else a is thrown.
The method to be called when the correlation calculation is completed.
An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Called by a correlation protocol when all of the correlation information is available to asynchronously construct the correlation.
Docs.returns: A reference to the current asynchronous operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnBeginFinalizeCorrelation%2A> to construct the correlation. Applications must provide an implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnBeginFinalizeCorrelation%2A>, which asynchronously performs the correlation calculation of the specified message.
To be notified when the asynchronous operation is complete, call <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.EndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> from the `callback` method. If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.EndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes. If the operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.
This method is an asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.FinalizeCorrelation%2A> using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern. For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).

Docs.param: The that references the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Returns the message that was prepared asynchronously for correlation.
Docs.returns: The message that was prepared for correlation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnEndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> to retrieve the message. Applications must provide an implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnEndFinalizeCorrelation%2A>, which returns the message that was prepared for correlation.
If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.EndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes. If the operation did not complete within the time-out interval specified in the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.BeginFinalizeCorrelation%2A> a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown when this method is called.
This method completes the asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.FinalizeCorrelation%2A> using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern. For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md).
